title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, day. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny are in the living room playing video games.

title: TOWELIE
text: HA! I killed you!

title: TOWELIE
text: HA, I blew your head off!

title: TOWELIE
text: (Aw, Goddamnit!)

title: TOWELIE
text: Jesus, is Cartman still in the bathroom?

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey Cartman! We're almost to level 20! You giving birth in there, or what?

title: TOWELIE
text: Let a man take a crap!

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, he's in there punishing my toilet.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hyeah, that poor, poor thing

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, Cartman! You're missing the game!

title: TOWELIE
text: I'm almost done, you smartasses! I'm just wipin' mah- whoa, what the hell is that?  You guys, look what I found in the trashcan in Stan's bathroom. It's like a bloody cotton thing wrapped in toilet paper.

title: TOWELIE
text: Well, why did you pull it out of the trash?

title: TOWELIE
text: Because I thought it was a jelly doughnut, but look, check it out, it's all bloody.

title: TOWELIE
text: Are you guys still playing that video game?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah. Hay Mom, Cartman found a bloody cotton thing in the bathroom.

title: TOWELIE
text: Look.  But I don't think it's for usin', I think it's just for lookin' through.

title: TOWELIE
text: Eric, put that down!

title: TOWELIE
text: Why?

title: TOWELIE
text: Just go put it back in the trashcan!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey, it's like all bloody. It might be alive.

title: TOWELIE
text: No that... that came from me; just put it away.

title: TOWELIE
text: This came out of you?? You just left it in the trashcan?!  You shouldn'ta done that. He's just a boih. Poor little feller.

title: TOWELIE
text: What is it, Mom?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah, what it is, Mrs. Marsh?

title: TOWELIE
text: Boys, that a... feminine thing. Alright, it's a personal, woman thing.  I tell you what: If you'll just drop the whole thing right now, I'll buy you that new video game console you've been wanting.

title: TOWELIE
text: The 2001 Okama GameSphere?

title: TOWELIE
text: Sure.

title: TOWELIE
text: Cool!

title: TOWELIE
text: Wow, this is like finding trashcan gold, you guiys!

title: TOWELIE
text: Luau's Toys, day, later. A banner reading "WE HAVE GAMESPHERE" hangs over the window, and the console itself is in the window display.

title: TOWELIE
text: There it is. The Okama GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, it's got a hundred twenty eight gigahertz DRAM

title: TOWELIE
text: What's that?

title: TOWELIE
text: I don't know, but it kicks ass.  Wow, dude, you're the luckiest kid in South Park.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey, this is all of ours. I'm the one who found Stan's aborted brother in the trashcan and blackmailed his mom into getting the GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, alright, but you guys gotta see if you can sleep over for the rest of the weekend.  It's Saturday at 2:30 - that means we have... 39 hours to play GameSphere until school on Monday!

title: TOWELIE
text: (Woohoo!)

title: TOWELIE
text: Awesome!  Oh, crap.

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: I'm supposed to go to the lake with my family tomorrow and swim and play in the stupid sun.

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, we got GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: I know, I know. Well, look: I'll stay over anyway so I can play for... eighteen hours, and then I'll go to the lake.

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't forget to bring a towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: When you get out of the water you need to dry off right away to avoid catchin' a cold. That's why Towelie says, "Don't forget to bring a towel."

title: TOWELIE
text: ...O-kay.

title: TOWELIE
text: Thanks, Towelie.

title: TOWELIE
role: Towelie	[after a few moments of silence] Do you wanna get high?

title: TOWELIE
text: No.

title: TOWELIE
text: Anyway, that will give me plenty of time playing video games.

title: TOWELIE
text: Kyle, I think you underestimate Okama GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Here you go, boys.

title: TOWELIE
text: AAAAAA.

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, later. In the living room, Kyle finishes connecting the GameSphere to the back of the TV

title: TOWELIE
text: Okay, turn it on.

title: TOWELIE
text: "Okama GameSphere"

title: TOWELIE
text: Whoa!

title: TOWELIE
text: Thirst For BLOOD

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh yeah, Thirst for Blood. Bring it.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, this is so cool.

title: TOWELIE
text: Bring it, bring it!

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, night. The boys have been playing for hours. Around them are empty boxes of Cheesy Poofs and cans of Zoop soda. On the sofa is a bag of chips. Stan's parents walk up to the boys.

title: TOWELIE
text: Goodnight, boys. Don't stay up too late.

title: TOWELIE
text: G'night Mom, thanks for GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah, but you still shouldn'ta done that. 'E's just a boih.

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: Nothing. Come on, Randy.

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, Sunday morning, dawn. The boys have stayed up all night playing video games. Kyle is on the phone with his parents.

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeahyeah, Mom. I-I can't go to the lake. No, S-stan's having emotional problems and I need to help see him through it. He's got-  wha-what is it?

title: TOWELIE
text: Date-rape psychosis.

title: TOWELIE
text: Date-rape something. Yeah. Okay. I will. Okay, thanks, Mon.  I don't have to go outside!

title: TOWELIE
text: Awesome!

title: TOWELIE
text: She said it's fine, but that I still have to go to baseball practice tonight..

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, yeah, we got baseball practice today. God damnit!

title: TOWELIE
text: We shouldn't have this many responsibilities! We're children!

title: TOWELIE
text: Well, it's alright. We can still play for  six more hours, and then we'll go play baseball.

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't forget to bring a towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: Uh no.

title: TOWELIE
text: When you're playin' sports, the sweat can get in your face. That's why Towelie says, "Always keep an extra towel in your duffle bag."

title: TOWELIE
text: Okay, we will.

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright!  Do you wanna get high?

title: TOWELIE
text: No we don't wanna get high!

title: TOWELIE
text: Okay... You sure?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yes! Go away, you stupid towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, dude! Did you see that? I cut off your face and ate it!

title: TOWELIE
text: That's... so... cool!

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, later... The boys have repositioned themselves and look half-asleep from all the game play. Doughnuts and ice cream appear - a cone is on the rug with its ice cream melting. Sharon walks up to them again.

title: TOWELIE
text: Okay, boys, that's it. You have to go now.

title: TOWELIE
text: No no, it's okay, Mom. We c-we can't go to baseball practice 'cause Kyle has cancer.

title: TOWELIE
text: No, Stanley, it's Monday morning. You have to go to school.

title: TOWELIE
text: It's Monday?

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, uh, I'm sick.

title: TOWELIE
text: Me too.

title: TOWELIE
text: No, you're not sick. Now get to school. All of you.

title: TOWELIE
text: But Mom...

title: TOWELIE
text: Go!

title: TOWELIE
text: Aagh!

title: TOWELIE
text: Bus stop, moments later. The boys are now waiting for the bus.

title: TOWELIE
text: Can't believe we have to go to school!

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah, real life is so boring and stupid.

title: TOWELIE
text: We just have to try and make the day go as fast as possible so we can get back to GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hello, boys, how are you?

title: TOWELIE
text: Fine.

title: TOWELIE
text: Say, boys, this may sound a little ...odd, but... have you see a ...talking ...towel around anywhere.

title: TOWELIE
text: What? You mean Towelie?

title: TOWELIE
text: Echo, this is Garrett. I've got a code 5 at...  Park County, Colorado! Repeat! Code 5, Park County Colorado!

title: TOWELIE
text: What, dude?

title: TOWELIE
text: This is gonna be one looong-ass day.

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, Mondy afternoon. The boys arrive there from the bus stop

title: TOWELIE
text: That was the longest day of school ever!

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, hurry. I bet we can get to level 29!

title: TOWELIE
text: Stan's house, living room. The boys stand in from of the television

title: TOWELIE
text: Where is it?

title: TOWELIE
text: It... it was right here.

title: TOWELIE
text: Where the hell is it??

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, man, this isn't funny!  I need my fix!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hello?

title: TOWELIE
text: If you ever wanna see your Okama GameSphere again, you will bring us the towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: What? Who-who is this?

title: TOWELIE
text: Just get the towel and meet us at the gas station outside of town. Or else!

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't hurt it!

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: They've taken it. They've taken our Okama GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: No! ...No!

title: TOWELIE
text: Uh-uh-uh what do you mean "they've taken it"? Oh, this isn't happening! This isn't happening!!

title: TOWELIE
text: South Park, sunset. The boys walk down Main Street.

title: TOWELIE
text: Towelie!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey, towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: Where the hell is he?

title: TOWELIE
text: (I don't know. Where could it be?)

title: TOWELIE
text: I don't know. They guy on the phone thought we had Towelie, so now we gotta find him.

title: TOWELIE
text: What has this world come to? Where people can just... take your Okama GameSphere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey maybe we'd better do a towel call. Gebaayybeh!  Gebaayybeh!

title: TOWELIE
text: That's a towel call?

title: TOWELIE
text: This is hopeless. We're never gonna find him.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey, wait a minute. Towelie always showed up to give us towel advice when we'd said something about water.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey yeah.  Well guys, let's go to the swimming pool!  Aaah. Let's go take a shower!  Let's go waterskiing!

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't forget to bring a towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: There he is!

title: TOWELIE
text: Be sure to bring a towel so you don't get aaall wet. .

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, dude!

title: TOWELIE
text: Where are we goin'?

title: TOWELIE
text: Just come on! It's getting dark.

title: TOWELIE
text: Are we gonna get high?

title: TOWELIE
text: Outskirts of South Park, night. A full moon shines down on the boys as they reach the gas station

title: TOWELIE
text: Are you sure this is where they said to be?

title: TOWELIE
text: They said the gas station outside of town.

title: TOWELIE
text: Well, I'm gonna get a little high.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hold it!

title: TOWELIE
text: Who is that?

title: TOWELIE
text: Step... away... from the towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: There you are, towel. We've been looking all over for you.

title: TOWELIE
text: If you ever go to a hotel, be sure to bring your own towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: It isn't safe for you out here, towel. There are people out here to mean to harm you.

title: TOWELIE
text: 'Scuse me, can we have our Okama GameSphere back? We just wanna play video games.

title: TOWELIE
text: Your what?

title: TOWELIE
text: Agh! Look, dude, we're on level 24, about to cross into the Caverns of Madness!

title: TOWELIE
text: I don't know what you're talking about.

title: TOWELIE
text: You called us and said if we brought the towel you'd give us our video game back.

title: TOWELIE
text: Omigod!  IT"S A TRAP!!

title: TOWELIE
text: Cover! Cover!

title: TOWELIE
text: Goddamnit, what now?!

title: TOWELIE
text: Run, towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: Agh. Come on, they've gotta have our video game around here somwhere.

title: TOWELIE
text: Where's the towel?!

title: TOWELIE
text: It can't be far!  Alvarez, you and Mitchell sweep left!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hurry! You must get the towel back to Tynacorp!

title: TOWELIE
text: Where is our Okama GameSphere?

title: TOWELIE
text: Get the towel home  They will explain everything. Please, hurry!

title: TOWELIE
text: Aw, God-damnit!

title: TOWELIE
text: Do you know where he's talking about, Towelie?

title: TOWELIE
text: What? Oh yeah, back at the base. It's a long ways away.

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, we're gonna have to use this truck. Come on, guys.

title: TOWELIE
text: Well?

title: TOWELIE
text: They've gone, sir. It's like they've vanished out of thin air.

title: TOWELIE
text: Damnit! I knew those boys were protecting that towel.  They must have some unexplainable bond with it.

title: TOWELIE
text: Perhaps they're telepathically linked to the towel, sir, like E.T.

title: TOWELIE
text: It could already be anywhere, hiding out again. No, the time for being nice is over. We must instigate... Plan B.

title: TOWELIE
text: You mean...?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yes.  Destroy all towels within a thousand mile radius.

title: TOWELIE
text: A desert, later that night. The truck rolls along... Stan steers, Kyle, Towelie, and Cartman ride along. Kenny mans the pedals

title: TOWELIE
text: Are we getting close?

title: TOWELIE
text: I think so.

title: TOWELIE
text: A little more gas, Kenny.

title: TOWELIE
text: How long has it been since you've been back there.

title: TOWELIE
text: I've been wanderin' around on my own for the past few weeks. You know, helpin' people out with towel safety and proper towel use. It's important.

title: TOWELIE
text: No it isn't.

title: TOWELIE
text: Is!

title: TOWELIE
text: No it isn't.

title: TOWELIE
text: Is! Wait, turn down here. It's down this dirt road.

title: TOWELIE
text: Brake, Kenny, brake.

title: TOWELIE
text: Egh!

title: TOWELIE
text: M-maybe it's down that dirt road.

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, don't you remember where it is?

title: TOWELIE
text: I can't remember, it all looks the same. Hold on, let me get high.  then I'll remember where it is.

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, so where is it?

title: TOWELIE
text: Where's what?

title: TOWELIE
text: Agh!

title: TOWELIE
text: The base where you're from and where our Okama GameSphere is!

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, that does it! Brake angrily, Kenny!  Now listen, Towelie, we've just about had it with you!

title: TOWELIE
text: Well calm down.

title: TOWELIE
text: That's it!  You're not getting high again until we have our Okama GameSphere back!

title: TOWELIE
text: That's my last joint, asshole!

title: TOWELIE
text: I don't care! You'd better remember where your base is!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh man, why is everyone riding me today? God-damnit.

title: TOWELIE
text: A purple house, night. Inside, in the restroom, a woman washes her hands and face, then pulls a towel out of its rack to dry herself

title: TOWELIE
text: Kevin? Don't forget to wrap the potato salad in aluminum foil.  Kevin, is that you?

title: TOWELIE
text: Harris! Reach bang and clear!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hello?  WAAH!  Ohmigod! Oh no! Ohmigod!

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, it's clear! It's clear!

title: TOWELIE
text: a backyard. Mrs. Tweek pulls down some clothes she's had drying on clotheslines. As she nears the towels, three soldiers rush in and start firing away at them

title: TOWELIE
text: HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!

title: TOWELIE
text: Let's go let'sg o!

title: TOWELIE
text: A men's gym shower, night. Mr. Garrison is in the shower with two other men. He finishes and wraps a white towel with blue stripes around his waist, then walks towards his locker

title: TOWELIE
text: Get it!

title: TOWELIE
text: What the?

title: TOWELIE
text: Throw it down!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh alright, have your way with me if you must! Go on, fulfill you sick pleasures!

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, let's go!

title: TOWELIE
text: Huh where are you goin'?

title: TOWELIE
text: The truck the boys are driving pulls up in front of a gleaming glass building with "TYNACORP" above the entrance, and the boys pour out with Towelie

title: TOWELIE
text: This is where you came from?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah, I think so.  Oh man.

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: I'm so high right now. I have no idea what's goin' on.

title: TOWELIE
text: Tynacorp, inside. The boys walk down a long passageway

title: TOWELIE
text: Welcome home, Smart Towel RG-400.

title: TOWELIE
text: Ah hi, is this where our Okama GameSphere is?

title: TOWELIE
text: We're missing out on some quality video game time right now.

title: TOWELIE
text: Thank you for bringing him to us, boys. You see, this is not an ordinary towel. He is the RG-400 Smart Towel, designed with a computer chip inside the terry cloth

title: TOWELIE
text: We don't care.

title: TOWELIE
text: You see, here at Tynacorp, our goal was to make the perfect towel. A towel that would sense how wet or dry the user's skin was and fluff itself accordingly.

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, we don't care.

title: TOWELIE
text: Towelie was our greatest success. Smart enough to beat the average human at chess and absorbent enough to soak up even the toughest spills. But then one day, Towelie got high and just sort of wandered off.

title: TOWELIE
text: We... don't... care.

title: TOWELIE
text: All we wanna know is, who has our Okama GameSphere?

title: TOWELIE
text: Ah yes, your video game. I'm afraid that what we all experienced was a trap. They called you and said to bring the towel, and then they called us and said they were bringing Towelie back. Their plan was to wipe us all out with one fell swoop.

title: TOWELIE
text: Who's they?

title: TOWELIE
text: Why, the military. You see, after Towelie got high and wandered off from here, the military got a hold of him. They wanted to turn Towelie into a weapon of mass destruction.

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't care, don't care, don't care.

title: TOWELIE
text: Towelie was at their base for months as they tried to copy his TNA. But then, one day, Towelie got high and just sort of wandered off. Again.

title: TOWELIE
text: Goddamnit! Can we please... just get back to playing our video game, PLEASE?!

title: TOWELIE
text: I'm afraid not. Because your Okama GameSphere is at "their" base.

title: TOWELIE
text: Can you tell us where "that" is, please?

title: TOWELIE
text: You mean to go right into their base? Of course. The entry code should still be in Towelie's memory banks. You could sneak him in there and recover his TNA. Great plan.

title: TOWELIE
text: Secret Government Base, night. Inside, various military officials man a command center. Two soldiers walk up to the commander and salute him

title: TOWELIE
text: Sir! Sargeant Masters and Boll are reporting, sir!

title: TOWELIE
text: Ah yes.  Tell me, Marine, did you accomplish your primary goal?

title: TOWELIE
text: Sir yes sir! All towels have been destroyed! The Smart Towel is no doubt eliminated.

title: TOWELIE
text: Ahh. And you're... quite sure of this.

title: TOWELIE
text: Eh yes sir, there isn't a towel left within a hundred miles.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hmm...  So perhaps, then, you can explain to me why we just got footage of the towel returning to Tynacorp?!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oo we...

title: TOWELIE
text: He must have outsmarted us, sir.

title: TOWELIE
text: Well I'm through playing hide and seek! We've got no other choice! Prepare to blow up all of Colorado!

title: TOWELIE
text: The night sky. Clouds float by overhead, past the full moon. A helicopter flies into the sky and the camera follows it. Two officials prepare the boys for dives into the military base as the research leader talks

title: TOWELIE
text: In a moment we will be over the base. This is the only way in. Any attempts on the ground would be easily spotted by guard posts.

title: TOWELIE
text: Okay.

title: TOWELIE
text: I hate to send you back in there, Towelie, but only you have their security system in your memory banks.

title: TOWELIE
text: That's alright. It's always good to bring a towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: Good luck, boys. The fate of the world is depending on you.

title: TOWELIE
text: We're not doing it for the world, we're doing it for our video game. God, are you deaf?

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, boys. When you drop from the plane, cover and roll. Got it?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah.

title: TOWELIE
text: Go go go go go go!

title: TOWELIE
text: Dude, I figured it out.

title: TOWELIE
text: What?

title: TOWELIE
text: If we can go in, and get the GameSphere in 30 minutes, we could still be back at your house playing video games by midnight!

title: TOWELIE
text: So that'd be, like what, eight hours we could play before school?

title: TOWELIE
text: Seven and a half.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hurry up, stupid parachute!

title: TOWELIE
text: Secret Government Base, night. The boys land silently and start walking

title: TOWELIE
role: Cartman	Alright, I think we go over there. [the Secret Government
text: Base entrance is shown with Towelie and the boys approaching the gate]

title: TOWELIE
text: Let's see.  No.

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, Towelie! The guy said you have the security system in your memory banks.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hey it's been a long time!

title: TOWELIE
text: You just have no long-term memory 'cause you get high all the time!

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't preach to me, fatso!

title: TOWELIE
text: I can preach to you all I want, 'cause you're stupid!

title: TOWELIE
text: You're stupid!

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah, and you're a towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: You're a towel!  Just let me get high. I know I can remember if I get high.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, God damnit! Alright, fine!  Here's your stupid lighter.

title: TOWELIE
text: Hold on.  Wait a second  That's it!

title: TOWELIE
text: That's it?

title: TOWELIE
text: Yeah. That's the melody to "Funky Town." Won't ya take me down... to Funky Town.

title: TOWELIE
text: No, Towelie, the entry code!

title: TOWELIE
text: For what?

title: TOWELIE
text: God-damnit, I guess we're gonna have to climb the stupid fence.

title: TOWELIE
text: Secret Government Base, night, inside. The boys climb over the fence and sneak past a soldier without arousing suspicion. They end up at the genetic research building

title: TOWELIE
text: Well let's look in here.

title: TOWELIE
text: Kill... me... Kill... me.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh my God! No-o-o-o!

title: TOWELIE
text: Well well well. Look what the cat dragged in.

title: TOWELIE
text: What are these things?

title: TOWELIE
text: Genetic copies we tried to make with your TNA. They didn't work too well, I'm afraid.

title: TOWELIE
text: Kill... me.

title: TOWELIE
text: Do you have our Okama GameSphere?

title: TOWELIE
text: You did very well to get the towel this far, boys. I wonder: What did they tell you at Tynacorp? That the big, bad government wanted to genetically engineer a Towelie as a weapon? Now let me tell you the real story.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh God, don't care, don't care.

title: TOWELIE
text: Yes, we've been trying to make our own genetic copies of the towel, but only because we had to. You see, when we started spying on Tynacorp, we discovered a certain, terrifying secret.

title: TOWELIE
text: Go on! Ask him what terrifying secret.

title: TOWELIE
text: What terrifying secret?

title: TOWELIE
text: That Tynacorp was making these towels to take over the world!

title: TOWELIE
text: We're never gonna play our Okama GameSphere again, are we?

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't you see what genetically enhanced smart towels like these are capable of? You get out of the shower and dry yourself off. But even after you're dry, the towel makes you more dry. It keeps getting you drier and drier. Can you imagine it? What it would feel like to be way, way too dry? I'll tell you something: You don't want to know. And I don't know.

title: TOWELIE
text: And we don't care.

title: TOWELIE
text: You've been double-crossed by Tynacorp, kids. They set this all up to get you in here and take us down.

title: TOWELIE
text: So let me get this straight: Our Okama GameSphere is back at Tynacorp.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh yes. It has been all along.

title: TOWELIE
text: Can I kill the towel now, sir?

title: TOWELIE
text: Go ahead.

title: TOWELIE
text: No, wait.  Perhaps now, we can use their own towel against them. These boys must return to Tynacorp, and we will launch a sneak attack on Tynacorp as well. You boys can take the towel to Tynacorp's central core, and upload this encryption disk into their system, bringing them down once and for all.

title: TOWELIE
text: But we don't care!

title: TOWELIE
text: Tynacorp command center. The officials gather around the research leader

title: TOWELIE
text: What the hell is this?! The towel was supposed to go in there and then run its own self-destruct sequence!

title: TOWELIE
text: The towel has a will of its own. It's... learning compassion.

title: TOWELIE
text: We don't have the manpower to hold off the entire military AND stop those wonderboys from getting to the core!

title: TOWELIE
text: Then we have no choice. We'll have to test the new prototype a little... earlier.

title: TOWELIE
role: GS-401	[deep voice] Don't forget to bring a towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: Tynacorp, outside. Shadows appear in the brush across the way. The commander is there with his troops, the boys, and Towelie

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, boys, take the towel back in there and say your mission was accomplished. Then upload this encryption disk into their computers.

title: TOWELIE
text: We're just going in to get our video game back.

title: TOWELIE
text: If anything goes wrong, use this newly-developed photon rifle.

title: TOWELIE
text: Photon rifle, whatever.

title: TOWELIE
text: Tynacorp command center. The boys walk through the center slowly

title: TOWELIE
text: Hello? Hello, anybody here?

title: TOWELIE
text: Welcome to the party, boys!  HAAARRRHHHH!!

title: TOWELIE
text: HAAARRRHHHH!!

title: TOWELIE
text: So, you thought you could outsmart us, did you kids?

title: TOWELIE
text: Aaaaarrrr. Move move move move move move!  Don't make a move, you bastards!

title: TOWELIE
text: Bring the towel here, boys. They can't shoot children.

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't listen to them. They lied to you before.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh yes, boys. Obey your government! Well perhaps it's time these boys knew what was really gong on!

title: TOWELIE
text: Ohmigod, look!

title: TOWELIE
text: Our GamdSphere!

title: TOWELIE
text: Aw, sweet, it still saved our plays.

title: TOWELIE
text: You see boys, I'm afraid you were double-crossed. If they were the military, why wouldn't they just attack us to begin with? Because they're not the military!

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, maybe we lied to you, but it was to protect your own skin! We are a resistance group pretending to be the military to bring Tynacorp down!

title: TOWELIE
text: Whoa, check it out, guys, the parachute level.

title: TOWELIE
text: Sweet!

title: TOWELIE
text: But perhaps we should show these kids who Tynacorp really is made up of. Go on! Tell them why you've been making towels! Zytar!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, there's gold. Get the gold, Kenny!

title: TOWELIE
text: Our planet was dying! We had no choice but to find a new one! Manufacturing Smart Towels was our way to spy on humans to see how they lived.

title: TOWELIE
text: And now you know the horrible truth, boys.

title: TOWELIE
text: Truth or no, your alien-murdering group is over!

title: TOWELIE
text: Could you turn it up?

title: TOWELIE
text: Boys, try to reach the core override! We've got no choice but to try to take them all out!  I think I can get it from here, boys!

title: TOWELIE
text: What are you doing? You'll kill us all!

title: TOWELIE
text: Sorry, Zytar. Didn't yoru mom ever tell you? Don't mess with earthlings.

title: TOWELIE
text: Oooww!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hup hup. Come on, hang on.

title: TOWELIE
text: Whoa.

title: TOWELIE
text: (Help help! Heeelllppp!)

title: TOWELIE
text: Kenny!

title: TOWELIE
text: (Nooo!)

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh my God! Our GameSphere! You've gotta move me closer!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hurry up, Kyle! This place is coming apart!

title: TOWELIE
text: What are you doing?

title: TOWELIE
text: Get away from me, you evil towel!

title: TOWELIE
text: Towelie, listen to me. Let them go. Drop them.

title: TOWELIE
text: No way! They're my friends!

title: TOWELIE
text: They aren't your friends! Humans have ruined the planet, killed off their own environment! Their time is over. It is the towels' turn now.

title: TOWELIE
text: I've almost got it!

title: TOWELIE
text: You're going to let them go, Towelie! Because... I know your weakness.  Here. Yoiu can reach it. Come on, Towelie! How long has it been since you've had a nice burn, huh?! Twenty, thirty seconds?!

title: TOWELIE
text: Aw, crap!

title: TOWELIE
text: You're going to have to choose between their lives, and, getting high.

title: TOWELIE
text: You asshole.

title: TOWELIE
text: Towelie, don't let go of us, you God-damned towel! Kyle's almost there!

title: TOWELIE
text: Come, Towelie! Make your decision!

title: TOWELIE
text: I-I-I choose... I-I-I choose... both!

title: TOWELIE
text: I got it!

title: TOWELIE
text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

title: TOWELIE
text: Come on, guys. Let's go play video games!

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright!

title: TOWELIE
text: Hooray!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, dude, we finished level 50!

title: TOWELIE
text: Awesome!

title: TOWELIE
text: Oh, man, I have no idea what's goin' on.

title: TOWELIE
text: Check it out: Now we're going into the secret underground base.

title: TOWELIE
text: Alright, guys, focus. Looks like this is gonna be an underwater level.

title: TOWELIE
text: Don't forget to bring a towel.

title: TOWELIE
text: You are the worst character ever, Towelie.

title: TOWELIE
text: I know.
